DOC.brief_summary: The objectives of this study are 1) to assess the prevalence of vitamin D deficiency in a group of sub elite athletes and 2) to identify seasonal changes in vitamin D status and the effect that supplementation may have during the course of a year. The study is a double blinded parallel study design.
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D Status and Supplementation in Athletes
DOC.detailed_description: Study population: 175 elite/ sub elite athletes, male and female, aged 18-60y, from a variety of sport disciplines
DOC.criteria: athletes 1960y subjects who take vitamin D supplements
